item.title: OpenTelemetry Diagnostic - Fri Feb 27 17:39:07 UTC 2026
item.description:
Advanced diagnostic plugin for IntelliJ Platform with OpenTelemetry integration. Features: Export telemetry spans via OTLP to any compatible backend Track exceptions...
